    • \EqualsCondition

    A simple string comparator.

    Compares two strings for eqiality in a binary safe manner. Implements the condition interface specification.

    author Andreas Aderhold <andi@binarycloud.com> @copyright 2001,2002 THYRELL. All rights reserved @version $Id: faec716501a00cdeb84b8c893b5bbe5c76064dec $ @access public @package phing.tasks.system.condition
